project.name: BE THE DROP
project.desc: This is the second project I made during my internship at Cher Ami (Lyon during 3 months). I made the fallback version of the website in the case of the WEBGL version was not available.

project.name: HEAVEN
project.desc: I worked on this during my internship at Cher Ami (Lyon during 3 months). I realized the menu animation and participated to the integration of the site.

project.name: CHER AMI
project.desc: During 3 months, I had my internship at Cher Ami in Lyon. My first project consisted of making some changes on several pages of their website (about/contact). I was in charge to integrate new animations like the loader and the opening animation for the videos.

project.name: FIDGET CUBE
project.desc: When we started the fidget cube project, there were an ongoing financing campaign on Kickstarter. For this project I created the cube on Cinema 4D, made the slider and integrated several pages and the menu. To enjoy the best experience, it is better to open the website on an android phone with Chrome or Firefox because the API vibrations unfortunaly didn't work on IOS by now

project.name: STAR WARS
project.desc: This project has been made during an intensive week. The theme was Star Wars. I developped the blue visualizer, entirely in DOM which had to react to frequency of the sound.

about.title: Creative Developper
about.desc: I am a 21 student at HETIC. Since 4 years, I have been developping websites. I had the opportunity to work as a freelance during the last year. I like to experiment innovative technologies (especially with svg or scss) and love to discover new ways of coding. I am currently working for BNP Paribas.
about.internship: Actually, I am looking for an internship (3 months) between July and October 2017.
